name: d3-bboxCollide
description: A bounding box collision detection constraint for d3 forceSimulation.
author: Elijah Meeks

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -g d3-quadtree:d3 -o build/d3-bboxCollide.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-bboxCollide.js -c -m -o build/d3-bboxCollide.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-bboxCollide.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-bboxCollide.js build/d3-bboxCollide.min.js
